string.value: #p1101002# is contacting me in an emergency manner. I wonder what happened.
Something terrible must have happened at #bEreve#k. I better go find out.
According to #p1101002#, an important item from Ereve has been stolen by one of the minions who serves the Black Mage. What must that be? I better head over to Ereve.
Mayday, mayday! All members of the Cygnus Knights must return to #bEreve#k immediately. I repeat, everyone must return to Ereve immediately! Details available at Ereve.
We need everyone there at once, so go there ASAP.
I don't know what you're doing right now, but I can't think of anything else as urgent as this. I trust you to make a judgment worthy of a Cygnus Knight.

You've heard of a group out there that is there to support Black Mage, right? They are called the Black Wings and they are our main adversaries. Apparently, one of them managed to enter Ereve and steal a very important treasure.
I doubt the thief went very far, so we must conduct the search right this minute. The Chief Knights will provide details, so please go see your Chief Knight immediately.
